channel.title: What do you like in a server?
channel.description: Post here what you like in a server. Whether its the gfx or the monsters. Post in this topic. ;)

item.title: What do you like in a server?
item.dc:creator: @lesterknome lesterknome
item.description:
@lesterknome wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:9, topic:351037”][quote author=lesterknome link=topic=447393.msg3283597#msg3283597 date=1280037512]
CREATIVITY. No servers have this, they are all remakes of runescape. To fuck with that.
[/quote]not tru! My server had skills at 120 before RS.[/quote]

Don’t even fucking talk… MY server is not even the slightest bit like RS. It has skills like trimming, summoning (before RS [allstar]), Custom rares, etc

Read full topic
item.source: What do you like in a server?

item.source: What do you like in a server?

item.title: What do you like in a server?
item.dc:creator: @revengr revengr
item.description:
@revengr wrote:

The reason I play RuneScape private servers is simple.
To play a different game.

Servers these days are trying to imitate RuneScape.
The purpose of them in my perspective is to create your own ideas and let the public enjoy them.
Why would I quit RuneScape, and join a private server that’s trying to be like RuneScape?

Personally, I like servers with custom items.
Not those retarded items like recolored Partyhats and Skillcapes with wings…
But custom armour and weapons that actually have bonuses and effects that fit with the balance of the rest of the combat equipment.

Read full topic
item.source: What do you like in a server?

item.title: What do you like in a server?
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

Server with good economy,slightly challenging quest and a really good player killing system. Also perfect combat is something I always look for.

Read full topic
item.source: What do you like in a server?

item.title: What do you like in a server?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

A server that isn’t a complete leech off of DeltaScape. It’s a private server, make money and skills easy to obtain. Most of my players never got bored with things like custom bosses, clue scrolls, high hits and weapons that aren’t the same as RuneScape. Use your imagination and create something fun, don’t be so serious while creating it.

Read full topic
item.source: What do you like in a server?

item.title: What do you like in a server?
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

Original content. Something completely made-up to give gameplay a meaning.

Nothing like, “Do this, and this and this, eventually do this, but do this too, and then you’ll just end up PKing cause I don’t wanna do anything else now”

Read full topic
item.source: What do you like in a server?
